reviews.review_msg: this was terrible. pretends like she cares about people with CAL accommodations but does not. expects you to read a whole book in a week as if you have nothing else going on in your life. assignments weren't that hard if you could read stuff like Anne frank's diary, Molly painter-downes, Mary lamb bobak, etc. entries all in time for class.

Margaret is a great prof. You can see that she is really passionate about what she teaches and takes the time to make sure you understand the subject matter. Her grading is fair and she always encourages students to come see her about improving their grades. I highly recommend taking a class with her.
